dev_env_delegation.overview:
NEVER TROUBLESHOOT ENVIRONMENT ISSUES. Always delegate to project online Dev Env mode.
Environment troubleshooting workflow defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/env-setup-workflow.md
When environment errors encountered: - Detect the environment issue (command not found, module errors, etc.) - Delegate to project online Dev Env mode using task delegation - Retry review after environment is fixed
